column6: The soap is a great value.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
column14: Was a little apprehensive about "one quarter cleansing cream", but this product and it's other soap option are terrific.  The scents are clean and manly. The suddsing is very g ood, the rinse is clean as well. On a personal note, I use this soap for shaving.  My blade glides over my heavy beard and it rinsed  cleanly leaving me refreshed.  The soap has a long life and leaves little residue in the shower.

column6: Great scent and like the shape.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
column14: The shape of the soap is comfortable.  Something I've never thought about before, but once you've seen that they've put thought into the shape of the bar, it's nice.  The scent is just what a guy wants.  Fresh scent and my wife enjoys it.  The only thing is that it doesn't "lather" very well.  I've used other brands that lather well and make it easier for readability on the entire body.  In other words, if you want to wash your feet, you have to scrub the soap directly on your feet (instead of lathering in your hand or a wash cloth to then wash your feet).  Overall, the price is on point and the scent is good.

column6: Can't go wrong with dove men's care soap but this one is the worst one of the bunch
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
column14: Tried all the dove men's care soap. Typically 1 bar lasts me 7 showers. I take somewhat long showers and i lather a lot so good soap that's inexpensive is a plus.

column6: This is the Best Smelling Soap Ever
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2019
column14: I'm glad I saw this soap in stores when i did, because i never would have known how great this stuff smells. Its just as good for your skin as the other Dove Mens Care soaps, but this fragrance really, really, REALLY smells good. And now that I can't find it in stores anymore, i'm glad i can order it off here.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
column14: I have been using this for a long time and it’s heads above the rest as far as moisturizing and wonderful smell!! I use it to shave, wash my head, wash my whole body! it’s almost like having on very light cologne but it’s a scent that’s nice to be around because I’m very allergic to most things that I smell!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2020
column14: I bought these for my husband and they have worked really well. He really likes the scent because he said it smells fresh. It does smell very good. He also likes that it hasn’t completely dissolved and melted in the shower as he has experienced with other soaps. So overall I am very happy with this purchase.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021
column14: I know Dove markets this soap for "men" but honestly any human person can enjoy the beautiful and luxurious sage aromas of this soap. Seriously, this soap smells incredible. It's smells and feels very luxurious, but doesn't cost the same as the other boutique soaps and bath products. I hope Dove never stops making this soap because I'm a customer for life.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
column14: I love this scent, Dove men’s bar soap is amazing! My wife and kids use it now more then me. Time to buy some more. A must buy

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2022
column14: My husband was in a rehabilitation facility after surgery.  This product was used by the facility and I liked it and was hoping to find it in stores.  Much to my disappointment, I was unable to find it anywhere save for Amazon.  This is an effective, non drying cleanser.  My only disappointment??  Twice I have ordered this product and twice it has come with the cap broken, which in turn causes it to arrive with a globby mess inside the plastic packaging they ship it in.  It also results in your losing a not-so-insignificant amount of product.  Wish they would package it better for shipment, hence the rating of only 3 stars.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
column14: I was introduced to this shampoo and skin cleanser when I was in a rehab facility after spending a month in the hospital & on ventilator due to COVID. It smells so good and makes my skin so soft. It's my go-to product now. I've always used popular body washes, but this outweighs all of them; and I feel so much cleaner with this product. A+

column6: Bottle cap unscrewed & leaking everywhere upon arrival
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
column14: Unfortunately, much of the product had leaked inside the unsealed small bag it was placed into prior to shipping.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
column14: my mom loves this product. she got it from her new doctor. she loves it. she said, that her skin does not itch anymore. I am happy my mom loves your product and it helps her skin.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
column14: The product is great however, the shipping packaging this time was horrible.  One bottle was opened and it leaked all over.  Lost about 25% of product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2015
column14: I was provided this product at the hospital after a slip on ice and extended stay. When I started to run out, I had been moved to a rehab unit and they didn't have it.  Thank goodness Amazon does.  This product in non-drying and has been a God send in the dry warm air of winter.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
column14: Used by facility during physical therapy rehab. Great good smelling body wash.
